channel.title: From The Nish
channel.description: Curtis Colbary and Devin McArthur dive into the world of podcasting. From stories only heard in a small University town on the outskirts of the Canadian Maritimes, to discussions of Business, Technology and everything in between. Theses are the Stories from the Nish.
channel.itunes:author: Devin McArthur & Curtis Colbary
channel.itunes:subtitle: Stories From The Nish
channel.itunes:summary: Curtis Colbary and Devin McArthur dive into the world of podcasting. From stories only heard in a small University town on the outskirts of the Canadian Maritimes, to discussions of Business, Technology and everything in between. Theses are the Stories from the Nish.

item.title: 000 // Introduction
item.description: Curtis Colbary and Devin McArthur introduce themselves into the world of podcasting. What is this podcast? Who are we? Why are we doing this? The answers to these questions and more can be found in this Introductory Podcast
item.dc:creator: Devin McArthur & Curtis Colbary
item.itunes:author: Devin McArthur & Curtis Colbary
item.itunes:subtitle: Conversations, stories, and opinions from the Nish
item.itunes:summary: Curtis Colbary and Devin McArthur introduce themselves into the world of podcasting. What is this podcast? Who are we? Why are we doing this? The answers to these questions and more can be found in this Introductory Podcast

item.title: 001 // Conversation: First
item.description: What is this podcast? Who are we? Why are we still doing this? Well... we still don't know, but here we are again talking about some stuff.Tonights primary topic of choice, was education and its different styles inlcuding an open ended conversation about the liberal and technical domains of the education system.And we may have talked about who our first guest could be.
item.dc:creator: Devin McArthur & Curtis Colbary
item.itunes:author: Devin McArthur & Curtis Colbary
item.itunes:subtitle: Stories From The Nish
item.itunes:summary: What is this podcast? Who are we? Why are we still doing this? Well... we still don't know, but here we are again talking about some stuff. Tonights primary topic of choice, was education and its different styles including an open ended conversation about the liberal and technical domains of the education system. And we may have talked about who our first guest could be.

item.title: 002 // Guest: Brandon Hope
item.description: Today we interviewed our first guest on From the Nish, Brandon Hope, a former X-Men goalie on a championship contending team, and St.FX accounting student. Brandon talks about his experience transitioning from goalie to working professional, his experience running a business, and his general life philosphy, wrapped up with some great stories from the nish.
item.dc:creator: Devin McArthur & Curtis Colbary
item.itunes:author: Devin McArthur & Curtis Colbary
item.itunes:subtitle: Stories From The Nish
item.itunes:summary: Today we interviewed our first guest on From the Nish, Brandon Hope, a former X-Men goalie on a championship contending team, and St.FX accounting student. Brandon talks about his experience transitioning from goalie to working professional, his experience running a business, and his general life philosphy, wrapped up with some great stories from the nish.
